title: High‑detail tattoos in Tampa
subtitle: Online booking and aftercare with protective film (Saniderm/Emalla).
whatsapp_message: Hi! I'd like to book a tattoo session. My availability is...
aftercare: Keep the protective film on for 7 days (Saniderm/Emalla).
Avoid direct sun and heavy sweating while the film is on.
After removing: wash gently with neutral soap, pat dry, and moisturize.
